call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer) - Method in class org.extricate.minimud.quit
The player is removed from the Controller's storage list, and all player's are informed of their departure.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer) - Method in class org.extricate.minimud.say
Sends the message to all the players in the same room, by working through the players_list that the Controller has.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer) - Method in class org.extricate.minimud.shout

call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer) - Method in class org.extricate.minimud.user

call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer) - Method in class org.extricate.minimud.who
Gives a complete list of all the players on the MUD, with the inclusion of the player themselves.
Connection - Class in org.extricate.minimud
